author: Nicole Wetsman
title: What is contact tracing?
description: By finding everyone a person diagnosed with COVID-19 was in contact with, public health officials can blunt the spread of the disease. Google and Apple are building systems that agencies can use to build apps that will automate part of the process.
content:
Google and Apple announced today that theyll use bluetooth to track COVID-19 cases
Photo by Jason Redmond / AFP via Getty Images
During an infectious disease outbreak, one of the best tools public health experts have is old-school detective work: finding ea… [+3499 chars]
